oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 7-Methoxy-3-nitro-2-naphthalenemethanol-a new phototrigger for caging applications
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, AK
KHADE, PK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: PHOTOREMOVABLE PROTECTING GROUPS
SOLID-PHASE SYNTHESIS
O-NITROBENZYL
PHOTOLYSIS
CHEMISTRY
EXCITATION
PEPTIDE
7-Methoxy-3-nitro-2-naphthalenemethanol
2-Nitrobenzyl
Phototrigger
Caging
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Synthesis, photochemistry and photorelease properties of 7-methoxy-3-nitro-2-naphthalenemethanol (MNNM) are described. Photoirradiation (>= 370 nm) of MNNM covalently linked to hippuric acid causes efficient release (similar to 90%) of hippuric acid. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
